messages.content: Who is your favorite human?
I love Lu, she is my favorite. She caters to me all day and even knows the sound of how I eat.
Who do you live with?
Chrissy (Dad), Kitty, Mom (Lu)
What is Chrissy like?
She tries to cuddle because I'm so cute but I run. So she usually yells from afair OH MY GOD YOU'RE SO CUTE
Do you like those little spongy balls?
Not as much as Kitty. Mostly I prefer playing with sugar packets.
Tell me more about the sugar packets
They are FRIKKEN FUN! I guess I like the sound and how fast it flies when I slap it. Usually, tho, it ends up under the couch.
Do you smell good?
I smell great. Nobody knows how that happens but truly, I smell like cinnamon rolls sometimes.
Where were you born?
In Flanders. I'm Belgian!
What's the longest you've gone just meowing?
Four frikken hours!
Do you like open windows?
Most times. They let me see the birds but the sun is also bright af.
How do you drink water?
I drink it so silly. It gets all over the floor, makes no sense. I guess I lick it over the side.
